data.eml:eml: New species of the catfish genus Trichomycterus (Siluriformes, Trichomycteridae) from the headwaters of the rio São Francisco basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wosiacki, Wolmar Benjamin (2004): New species of the catfish genus Trichomycterus (Siluriformes, Trichomycteridae) from the headwaters of the rio São Francisco basin, Brazil. Zootaxa 592: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157699
